wikipedia_page.main:
Sam Andrews (born 3 February 1982) is an English List A cricketer who played his only for  Surrey Cricket Board.  His only List A game was against Surrey County Cricket Club. he scored 0 and did not get a wicket after bowling 6 overs.
He played 8 Second XI championship games for Surrey's Second XI team. and 2 games for Surrey's Second XI in the Second XI trophy.He also played 2 games for the Surrey Cricket board in the Minor Counties Trophy.
